loans.use: Purchase materials needed to repair her roof

loans.name: Ramiro De Jesus

texts.es: Ramiro lleva varios años en la fabricación y venta de helados y bolis de fruta, esta labor le ha permitido tener una buena calidad de vida para el y su familia, es por esto que Ramiro necesita un crédito que le permita tener mayor producción de sus productos y además poder iniciar el negocios de comidas rápidas y así generar nuevos empleos y empezar a conseguir su propio local.
texts.en: Ramiro has been making and selling ice cream and frozen fruit treats for several years.  This work has enabled him to provide a good quality of life for himself and his family.  For this reason, Ramiro needs a loan so that he can increase his production.  Later on he hopes to start a fast food business so that he can create new jobs and have his own establishment.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for his ice cream business

loans.name: Conny Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Conny Isabel D. L. ella es trabajadora activa de la entidad estatal, desempeñándose como Técnico en Laboratorio  tiene Veinte y un   años  de trabajar para esta institución  es casada actualmente, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  siete créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Conny Isabel D. L. is currently employed by a state agency as a lab technician. She has been working for this institution for 21 years. Conny is married and currently has two children in school.

She has received seven loans from CEPRODEL and each one was used to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, stone, gravel, blocks and other items to expand and improve her home. The loans from CEPRODEL have been a great benefit because they have enabled her to improve the living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials for home improvements

loans.name: Pedro

texts.en:
Through his artisanal jewelry and religious articles, Pedro has fostered a sense of heritage and community in Miami, bringing together art, beauty and a distinctive Latin American flair.

Originally from Colombia, Pedro began selling artisanal jewelry in  Miami  eight years ago when he noticed that items popular in Colombia were not necessarily being sold in the US. His biggest niche market has become national identification bracelets, which show the colors of a person’s nationality in their own individual style. Indeed, his greatest success is in the unique detail and style of his jewelry line.

This is Pedro’s second loan with ACCION USA. He will be purchasing more inventory in preparation for "Carnaval de la Calle 8" in Miami.  Like he says, Carnaval is incredibly popular and his jewelry sells like ‘hot bread’. 

Moving forward, Pedro wants to continue to expand his jewelry, which is already extended up the East Coast. His ultimate goal is to continue his success for both his family and business while bringing a little bit of Latin American culture to the US. 

About U.S. Microfinance and ACCION USA:

An estimated ten million small businesses in the U.S. face difficulty obtaining loans from traditional banks, even prior to the current “credit crisis”. Microfinance institutions, like ACCION USA, support these “unbanked” small businesses by giving them access to fairly-priced capital and business education. Small businesses also help stabilize low- to moderate-income neighborhoods and rebuild our economy through income growth and job creation. Self-employment provides workers with a way to increase their incomes, support their families, and strengthen their communities. The need for support of small businesses in the U.S. is great, and it is one that ACCION USA has been striving to meet since 1991.

loans.use: To purchase inventory to sell at "Carnaval" in Miami

loans.name: Aniceto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Aniceto; El socio tiene 41 años de edad, el socio  es casado el socio tiene 4 hijos, el menor de ellos tiene 4 años, el socio tiene una unidad vehicular, el socio presta el servicio de taxi, el socio desea hacer el mantenimiento a su auto y comprarle llantas, el socio invertirá el dinero en la compra de llantas nuevas para su auto, el socio hace 7 años era transportista y ahora con su vehículo realiza servicio de taxi en la ciudad. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de llantas.  

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sr. Aniceto is a member of the Communal Bank “Kantu de San Jeronimo” which is located in the District of Huanchac, Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

He is 41 years old, married, and has four children. The youngest child is four years old. Aniceto has a vehicle that he uses to provide taxi services. He wants to maintain his automobile and purchase tires. The money he requested will be invested in the purchase of new tires for his car. Aniceto has been a taxi driver for seven years and now uses his vehicle to provide taxi service throughout the city.

He is happy with the loan being provided and promises to complete his payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase tires for his vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, oil, toilet paper, soap

loans.name: El Sauce Group

texts.es: Francisca M. P., es casada, tiene 37 años D. edad,tiene 5 hijos D. las cuales 4 estan estudiando, se dedica a oficios domesticos,m cuenta cn el apoyo D. su esposo que es jornalero, tambien se dedica a la venta D. leña, tiene 3 años D. experiencia con este trabajo, empezo su negocio vendiendo leña a sus familiares, quiere ver su negocio granD., por esa razon decidio organizar un grupo, y asi poder solicitar un prestamos y ampliar el capital con que cuentan cada una D. las integrantes, que le servira para ampliar su capital D. trabajo, el grupo se llama el SAUCE, con 5 integrantes, que se dedican al diversas actividades: venta D. leña, venta D. comida, venta D. articulos D. consumo diario. Son entusiasta y esperan obtener mejores ganancias, para una mejor condicion D. vida.
texts.en:
Francisca M. P., 37, is married and has five children four of whom are in school.  She is a housewife and has her husband’s support; he’s a day laborer.  She also sells firewood.  She has three years experience in this line of work.  She started out selling firewood to her relatives.  She’d like to see her business be large so decided to organize a group to request a loan to increase each of the member’s capital that would serve to expand their working capital

The group is called El Sauce (Willow) and has five members who are in a variety of activities: firewood sales, food sales, grocery sales.  They are enthusiastic and hope to earn better profits for improved living conditions.

loans.use: For working capital (firewood sales)

loans.name: Javier Fausto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Javier; El socio tiene 28 años de edad, el socio  es soltero el socio tiene 1 hijo,  el socio es mecánico y fabrica todo tipo de carrocerías, el trabaja en base de los materiales de fierro y madera, el socio tiene de clientes en especial los camiones, camionetas que son acopladas para llevar mercadería pesada, el socio tiene su pequeño taller y le va muy bien el socio ahora desea el crédito para poder invertir en mejorar su casa, el socio desea revestir las paredes de su vivienda y pintar y retejar el techo. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en mejorar su casa.

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
He is a member of the village bank "Kantu de San Jeronimo".  This bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province and department of Cusco.

His name is Mr. Javier.  He is 28 years old, single and a father of 1 child.  He is a mechanic and he does all sorts of body work.  He works with iron and wood.  A lot of his clients are trucks and pick-up trucks that are adjusted to carry heavy loads. He has a small workshop and his work is going very well.  Now he would like to ask for a loan to invest in improving his home.  He wants to re-do the walls of the home and paint and re-tile the roof.  He asks for the loan for the home improvements.

He is happy with the loan he has been presented and promises to meet the payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: He asks for a loan to invest in improving his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase notebooks, writing tablets, pens, reams of paper, pencils

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy merchandise to increase inventory: oil, chicken, sugar, rice, beans, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy basic grains, soft drinks, soap, cosmetics, fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es:
Con una experiencia de 10 años, de manera empírica desde el año 2004 Luis Carlos inició r su propio negocio de venta de mercancía con los ahorros que ya tenía.
Actualmente vende variedad de mercancía, en especial lencería, ropa para el hogar y electrodomésticos menores en los municipios de Porce, Barbosa y Rionegro, lugares que atiende entre las 8 am y las 5 pm.
El negocio es la principal fuente de ingresos para sostener a su familia. 

Gracias a su persistencia, dedicación y empeño ha logrado sostenerse en el mercado, pese a las dificultades de orden público que suelen presentarse en las veredas y barrios de los municipios que atiende, a la movilidad de los clientes que se le trasladan y por tanto pierde cartera.  Pero su buen criterio le ha permitido subsistir, generar utilidades y reinvertir de manera discreta.
 
S sueño es llegar a conformar un almacén para constituirse como proveedor de mercancía al por mayor y al detal.
texts.en:
Luis Carlos had 10 years of informal experience and in the year 2004 started his own general merchandise sales business using savings he had already.  He currently sells a variety of merchandise, especially lingerie, linens and minor home appliances in the towns of Porce, Barbosa and Rionegro, places he services from 8am until 5pm.  The business is his main source of income to support his family.

Thanks to his persistence, dedication and effort he has managed to sustain in the market despite public order difficulties that tend to arise in the paths and neighborhoods of the towns he visits and of the mobility of customers who tend to relocate causing him to lose money.  But his smart decisions have allowed him to subsist, earn profits and reinvest discretely.

His dream is to manage to set up a warehouse so that he can become a wholesaler and a retailer.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Lino Alexis

texts.es:
El señor Alexis es un pequeño comerciante quien trabaja por su cuenta en la comercialización de queso y crema el cual viaja diariamente para vender este producto tiene más de 5 años en estas actividad
Este es el primer crédito que solicita en la institución el cual será invertido en la mejora de la vivienda ya que quiere construir unas parades como división  que en la actualidad son de plásticos 
En la actualidad está casado y con dos hijos a su cargo su esposa es ama de casa
texts.en:
Alexis is a small merchant working independently selling cheese and cream.  He travels daily to sell these products and has more than five years experience in this activity.

This is the first loan he’s requested from the institution and it will be used for home improvement because he wants to build a few interior walls which currently are plastic sheets.  

He is married and has two children in his care; his wife’s a housewife.

loans.use: To buy bricks and sacks of cement.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
Maria de 59 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio ya que desde joven comenzó con su gabinete de belleza. 

Quiere seguir trabajando para asegurar su futuro  por eso ahora trabaja desde muy temprano. Quiere comprar con el préstamo herramientas para su gabinete de belleza. Ya que cada corte de cabello lo cobrar a partir de $ 2.00. En el futuro quiere que toda su familia este bien saludable y que su negocio siga prosperando.
texts.en:
María, 59, is a hard working woman with lots of hope in her business; she started a beauty salon when she was young.

She wants to continue working to assure her future; this is why she starts working very early.  She wants to use the loan to buy tools for her beauty salon; her haircuts start at $2.00.  

She hopes her family will be very healthy in the future and that her business continues to prosper.

loans.use: Work tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: La Bendicion 5 Group

texts.es: Doña Rebeca Melchora R. Q., es casada, tiene 35 años D. edad, estudio hasta el sexto año D. educaciòn primaria, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la panaderia y a ser ama D. casa, el esposo se dedica a ser ayudante D. bus, empezo su trabajo, comprando y vendiendo pan, deciD. entonces organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un prestamo que le servirà para invertir lo en el trabajo que realiza; la integrantes del grupo se dedican a diversas actividades productivas que son: venta D. pan, compra y venta D. cortes tipicos, compra y venta D. carne, esperan ver su negocio con muchos clientes.
texts.en: Rebeca Melchora R. Q. is 35 years old and is married.  She attended school until the 6th graD., she has two children and she is a housewife and also tends to the bakery.  Her husband works as an assistant on a bus.  She started working by buying and selling bread, she then decided  to organize a group in order to solicit a loan that will be used to invest in their current work field.  Members of the group work in a variety of productive activities, like: selling bread, purchase and selling meat, purchase and selling typical cuts, and they hope to see their businesses with many clients.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy basic grains for her grocery store.

loans.name: G.s. Los Coquitos Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Los Cocos está conformado por Ery Neftali y Paz Catalina. Se han unido para realizar financiamientos, para la compra de materia prima necesaria en sus negocios. Ery se dedica a brindar el servicio de triciclo con muchos esfuerzos, tiene que realizar este negocio todos los días pues tiene que mantener a sus 2 hijos que están a su cargo. Hace más de 12 años que tiene este medio de vida, pues siempre ha trabajado con mucho sacrificio.
texts.en:
The Los Cocos communal bank’s members are Ery Neftali and Paz Catalina.  They have joined together to take out loans to buy needed raw materials for their businesses.

Ery provides tricycle services with much effort.  The work has to be done daily because there are two children to support.  He has had this means of support for over 12 years because he’s always worked with much sacrifice.

loans.use: For working capital.

loans.name: Believe In God Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone is very pleased to present to you members of the “Believe in God” group. These are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders for the second time to seek for a loan of SLL 800,000.00 for each in order to further invest in their businesses. 

Umu J. is the leader of this group. Umu is 39 years old and married with 4 children – 3 in primary school and 1 in secondary school. Umu sells soap, sweets, salts, etc. She has been doing this business for 7 years now. With the help of this loan, Umu will invest in her business by buying the above mentioned items in large quantity to add to her current ones.

loans.use: To buy soap, sweets, salts, etc. in large quantity to add to her business.

loans.name: Guzman Eleuterio

texts.es:
Guzman de 47 años, es un microempresaria que con esfuerzo y dedicación ha trabajado para que su familia tenga todas las comodidades que se merecen. Comenzó con sus ventas de helados hace varios años. 

En la actualidad trabaja desde muy temprano con ayuda de su esposa e hijos. Vende los helados a un precio muy económico desde $ 0.40 y $ 0.75. Una de las complicaciones de vender los helados es la delincuencia que hay en la zona donde vive. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio pero por ahora quiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción y darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Guzman, 47, is a micro businessman who works hard and diligently so that his family will have all the comforts they deserve.  He started selling ice cream several years ago.

He currently works from very early with help from his wife and children.  He sells ice cream at very reasonable prices starting from $0.40 and $0.75.  One of the complications he faces selling ice cream is the lawlessness in his neighborhood.  

He has many hopes for his business but what he wants the loan for now is to buy building materials and supplies to provide his family a better life.

loans.use: For zinc metal sheeting and concrete blocks.

loans.name: Leonel Jose

texts.es:
LEONEL M. R., ES DE MANAGUA, TIENE SU NEGOCIO DE VENTA DE PRODUCTOS DE GRANOS BASICOS, FRUTAS Y VERDURAS, PRODUCTOS LACTEOS Y BOTERIA, TIENE MAS DE 2 AÑOS DE TENER EL NEGOCIO.
ES PADRE DE FAMILIA DE DOS HIJOS, Y ESTOS ACTUALMENTE DEPENDE DE EL Y UNA SE ENCUENTRA EN EL COLEGIO.
DON LEONEL ACUDE A LAS OFICINAS DE CEPRODEL PARA SOLICITAR UN NUEVO PRESTAMO PARA  INVERTIR EN LA COMPRA DE MERCADERIA COMO: GRANOS BASICOS, FRUTAS Y PRODUCTOS LACTEOS. 
LEONEL DICE QUE GRACIAS AL FINANCIAMIENTOS OTORGADOS POR CEPRODEL SU NEGOCIO HA CRECIDO Y AHORA CUENTA CON MAS PRODUCTOS PARA OFERTAR.
texts.en:
LEONEL M. R. is from Managua.  He has a business selling basic grains, fruit, vegetables, dairy products and shoes.  He’s had the business over two years.

He’s the father of two children who are dependent on him; one of them is in school.

Leonel comes by the Ceprodel offices to request a loan to buy merchandise like: basic grains, fruit and dairy products.

Leonel says that thanks to Ceprodel loans his business has grown and now he has more products to offer.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, fruit, vegetables and dairy products.

loans.name: La Bendicion De Dios Group

texts.es: Doña Odilia P. L. D. M., es casada, tiene 23 años D. edad, tiene 3 hijos los cuales estan estudiando para tener un mejor futuro, se dedica a ser ama D. casa como tambien se dedica a la crianza D. pollos, tiene 2 años D. expereincia  con este trabajo, compra pollos pequeños para venderlos cuando estos sean grandes y recuperar su inversion y obtener sus ganancias. DeciD. organizar Organizar un grupo para solicitar un prestamo a ASDIR y asi ampliar el capital D. trabajo D. cada una D. ellas. Las integrantes D. este grupo se dedican a diversas actividades como: crianza D. pollos, crianza D. cerdos, produccion D. banano y la venta D. cortes tipicos. Esperan mejorar sus ingreso y sus ganancia con la inversion del prestamos que estan haciendo a ASDIR.
texts.en:
Mrs. Odilia P. López D. Marroquín, 23, has three children who are studying to have a better future.  She’s a housewife but also raises chickens; she has two years experience with this work.  She buys young chickens and sells them when they are grown to recuperate her investment and make profits.

She decided to organize a group to request an ASDIR loan to expand each member’s working capital.  The group members are involved in a variety of activities like: chicken raising, raising pigs, plantain farming and the sale of typical costumes.

They hope to improve their income and profits with the investment of the loans they are getting from ASDIR.

loans.use: Capital for chicken raising.

loans.name: Fidia Feliciano

texts.es: El Sr. Fidia Feliciano A.  es trabajador  activo de una entidad estatal  desempeñándose como Maestro de Educación Secundaria  tiene Veinte años  de trabajar para esta institución  es Acompañado actualmente, tiene un hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Fidia Feliciano A. is employed as a Secondary School Teacher at a state school.  He has been working for this institution for 20 years.  He has a life partner and a school age child.  

He has had two CEPRODEL loans that have been used to buy building materials and supplies like: sand, cement, stone, gravel, concrete blocks, etc. to enlarge and improve his house.

Ceprodel loans have been of great benefit for him because they have made it possible for him to improve his and his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Conaky Traders Group

texts.en:
These people run small businesses in Makeni, a city in northern Sierra Leone. They have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to seek their second loan in order to enable them to expand their businesses. With this loan, they will be able to add more stock to their businesses, make more sales, and more profits. Consequently, they will be able to improve their standard of living by sending their children to school, feed and clothe them. 

Fatmata S. is the leader of this group. She was born in Makeni 29 years ago. She is married and has four children. Fatmata sells milk, sugar, and cocoa. With her share of the loan, she will expand her business by purchasing these products in bulk.  

(Also included in the right of the photo is loan officer, Zainab Bangura, handing over the loan to the borrowers.)

loans.use: To buy milk, sugar, and cocoa in bulk.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es:
La señora C. vende ropa en una tienda que se encuentra en su casa con más de 5 años de experiencia este crédito lo utilizara para la compra de uniformes escolares ya que en pocos días comienza el año escolar en este municipio
Este negocio lo empezó poco a poco vendiendo ambulante y poca cantidad de vestuario y fue consiguiendo clientes 
Ella espera que con este préstamo logre vender estos artículos ya que como inicia el año escolar son de mucha demanda 
Martha está casada con 2 hijos su esposo se dedica al destace de cerdo
Doña Martha dice que los créditos con ceprodel le han ayudado para mejorar su negocio y a la vez aumentar el mismo
texts.en:
Mrs. C. sells clothes in a store located in her house.  She has over five years in business.  She will use this loan to buy school uniforms because this town’s new school term starts in a few days.

She started the business bit by bit selling door to door with a small amount of clothes and gradually acquired clientele.  She hopes with this loan to sell these articles because there is much demand because the school year is starting.

Martha is married and has two children; her husband butchers pigs.

Martha tells us that Ceprodel loans have helped her improve her business as well as to enlarge it.

loans.use: To buy pants and school uniforms as well as shoes.

loans.name: Javier De Jesus

texts.es: Javier trabaja la cerrajería hace 23 años, sin embargo una de sus dificultades es que no tiene todas las herramientas necesarias para poder realizar completamente su trabajo y por eso ha habido ocasiones que no puede realizar, es por esto que necesita comprar varias herramientas que además de facilitarle el trabajo tiene la posibilidad de ofrecer otros trabajos a sus clientes y así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Javier has been working as a locksmith for 23 years. Unfortunately one of his troubles is that he doesn't have all the necessary tools to complete his work entirely, which is why on several occasions he has been unable to do so.  This is why he needs to purchase various tools that would, aside from facilitating the work, make it possible to offer other services to his clients.  This way he can improve his quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase machinery

loans.name: Susana Marlyn

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Susana. La socia tiene 40 años de edad, la socia  es soltero y tiene 1 hijo,  la socia antes se dedicaba a la venta de celulares, la socia es guía de Turismo y tiene su tienda de abarrotes, la socia trabaja como guía y estos meses está atendiendo su tienda junto a su hija y su madre, la socia desea mejorar su casa, ella solicita el crédito para mejorar su casa y revestir las paredes y poder hacer los últimos acabados en su vivienda. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en el arreglo de su vivienda.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Susana, 40, is a member of the “KANTU DE SAN JERONIMO” communal bank located in Huanchac district which is in Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is single and has one child.  She used to sell cell phones.  She’s a Tourism Guide and also runs her grocery store.  She works as a Guide and during these months she tends to her store with her daughter and mother.

She wants to improve her house and is asking for a home improvement loan to reseal walls and do the last finishing touches to the house.  She is asking for the loan to invest in home repairs.

She is happy with the granted loan and commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: For home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase construction materials: Sand, Cement, Stone, Purlins, Zinc, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Luz Stella

texts.es:
Luz Stella inicia su negocia en una caja de madera, sin embargo por su buen servicio recibe apoyo de uno de sus proveedores y le da un kiosko para que su negocio pudiera crecer y ofrecer mayor cantidad de productos y así mantener contentos a sus clientes.

Ella necesita comprar mas variedad de productos no solo para incrementar las ventas sino también para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Stella started her business in a wooden box.  However, thanks to the good service she provided she got support from one of her providers who gave her a kiosk so that her business could grow and offer a larger amount of products thus keeping her customers happy.

She needs to buy a wider variety of products not only to increase sales but also to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To buy ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ladies accessories.
